price: Siku hiyo walio kufuru na wakamuasi Mtume watatamani Ardhi isawazishwe juu yao. Wala hawataweza kumficha Mwenyezi Mungu neno lolote.
arabic: يَوۡمَئِذٖ يَوَدُّ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُواْ وَعَصَوُاْ ٱلرَّسُولَ لَوۡ تُسَوَّىٰ بِهِمُ ٱلۡأَرۡضُ وَلَا يَكۡتُمُونَ ٱللَّهَ حَدِيثٗا
footnotes: Yatapo tokea haya watatamani hao wapinzani wanao pinga lau kuwa wangeli potea chini ya Ardhi kama wanavyo potea maiti makaburini! Na wao hawawezi kumficha Mwenyezi Mungu kitu chochote katika mambo yao, na hali zao na vitendo vyao vitadhihiri.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: yawma-idhin yawaddu alladhīna kafarū waʿaṣawū al-rasūla law tusawwā bihimu al-arḍu walā yaktumūna al-laha ḥadīthan
